snippet: Cybersecurity experts said they were able to take down Grum, the world's third-largest botnet, on Wednesday. Grum, computer security experts say, was responsible for roughly 18 percent of global spam, or 18 billion spam messages a day.
abstract: Cybersecurity experts said they were able to take down Grum, the world's third-largest botnet, on Wednesday. Grum, computer security experts say, was responsible for roughly 18 percent of global spam, or 18 billion spam messages a day.

headline.main: Researchers Say They Took Down World's Third-Largest Botnet
